name: The Outlaw, The Drunk, & The Whore
description: When three unscrupulous jerks meet an early demise, only the devil himself can give 'em another shot at that federal gold!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP, 7 Processor: Fully tested on 2Ghz, older machines should have no problem too Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Anything that handles basic hardware acceleration Storage: 77 MB available space Sound Card: No fancy sound card required
